name: Score Pressure
description:
Are game jams just Gamedev speedrunning?🤔

*Download will have less lag than web*

Tip: If you don't understand the final score text, just ignore it. I added it to maybe help some people understand, but it could be confusing.

If you don't want the music you can turn in down on the titlescreen.

If you are new Please do the tutorial!

*Mac build has not been confirmed to work. If it doesn't work, please tell me in the comments!

...there is a secret mode/level when you beat the tenth

level...
